text: SERE may refer to two related military training programs: * Survive, Evade, Resist, Extract training, United Kingdom * Survival, Evasion, Resistance and Escape training, United States ** "SERE" (The Unit), an episode of the television series The Unit which centers on such a training exercise *Seral community or Sere, an intermediate stage found in ecological succession in an ecosystem
title: SERE
